title: Drawing, "Schlesinger: Serving Cart", December 8, 1936
medium: Graphite and black ink on tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Stamp in black ink, lower right: 8523/F.S./SCHLESINGER, OLSSON/D./12/8/36, 12/8/36, 1, SL./12/10/36, 1; inscribed in graphite, lower right: TEA TABLE - TEAK VENEER AS INDICATED/42" x 20" x 31" H./ALL HARDWARE POL. CHROM. ON BRASS/TUBULAR LEGS WITH CASTERS BY OTHERS; dimensions, materials, instructions in graphite
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawings for tea serving cart in teakwood veneer. Rectangular top of table with rounded corners, open shelf below and cabinet near bottom. Tubular metal legs connecting top surface with cabinet, casters on feet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Schlesinger: Serving Cart", December 8, 1936.
December 8, 1936. Graphite and black ink on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-981.
